title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Language Learning Promotion Through Robot-Collaborative Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can create digital storytelling based on daily conversation scenarios through collaboration with robots
Learners can analyze the social context of language expressions by utilizing the robot's visual feedback system
Learners can improve communication strategies by applying a three-stage (planning-execution-evaluation) language learning process
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
